full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Solicitation Title

* English: Design, Fabrication, Delivery, and Commissioning of a DC Power Supply System
* French: Conception, fabrication, livraison et mise en service d'un système d'alimentation en courant continu

### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3630343075 - Doc3893269032
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3630343075

### Important Dates

* **Public Notice Date**: March 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 11, 2023 at 02:00 PM EST
* **Contract Start Date**: December 1, 2022
* **Contract End Date**: March 29, 2024

### Procurement Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND), on behalf of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites Bidders to submit a proposal for the design, fabrication, and delivery, and commissioning of a DC Power Supply system. The successful bidder will be required to design, fabricate, and deliver the DC Power Supply system in compliance with the specified requirements.

### Procurement Method

This procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the $procurementMethod-comprehensive Procurement Guidelines. The selection criteria is the **Lowest Price**.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is logged under the following trade agreement(s):

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Jason Smith of the Department of Public Works and Government Services.

* **Contact Name**: Jason Smith
* **Contact Email**: [jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*
